lead_paragraph: The business is to be acquired by a consortium including Deutsche Bank and the private equity firms Värde Partners and Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.

headline.main: GE Capital Agrees to Sell Australia and New Zealand Operations for $6.3 Billion
headline.print_headline: GE Capital Agrees to Sell Australia and New Zealand Operations for $6.3 Billion

snippet: The business is to be acquired by a consortium including Deutsche Bank and the private equity firms Värde Partners and Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.
